title: Pretty Rhythm: Aurora Dream Special
alternative_title: Pretty Rhythm: Aurora Dream - Prism Shougekijou, プリティーリズム・オーロラドリーム　プリズム笑劇場
description: Prism Stars are performers on the new popular ice show, Prism Show. They are superidols whose techniques, singing and fashion sense are a cut above all others. Aira and Rhythm are two Prism Stars whose goal is to become the best, the Prism Queen. However, the road to success is bumpy.
